00108 {

00110     1<<LED1_BIT,

00136 uint8_t intensity_table[NUM_INTENSITIES] =
00137 {
00138     0,
00139     1,
00140     4,
00141     8,
00142     14,
00143     22,
00144     32,

00163 void led_init(void)
00164 {
00165     uint8_t i;
00166 
00167     // Initialize each led port into a known state
00168     for (i = 0; i < NUM_LEDS; i++) {
00169         // Set output value to 0
00170         *port_table[i] &= ~bitmask_table[i];
00171         // Config the I/O pin as output
00172         *ddr_table[i] |= bitmask_table[i];
00173     }
00174 }
00175 
00184 void led_off(uint8_t led)
00185 {
00186     *port_table[led] &= ~bitmask_table[led];
00187 }
00188 
00194 void led_on(uint8_t led)
00195 {
00196     *port_table[led] |= bitmask_table[led];
00197 }
00198 
00209 void display_for(uint8_t ticks)
00210 {
00211     uint8_t i;
00212     uint8_t j;
00213     uint8_t k;
00214     uint8_t x0, x1, x2;
00215 
00216     for (k = 0; k < ticks; k++) {
00217         for (i = 0; i < NUM_LEDS; i+=3) {
00218             x0 = intensity_table[values[i]];
00219             x1 = intensity_table[values[i+1]];
00220             x2 = intensity_table[values[i+2]];
00221             if (x0 > 0)
00222                 led_on(i);
00223             if (x1 > 0)
00224                 led_on(i+1);
00225             if (x2 > 0)
00226                 led_on(i+2);
00227             j = 0;
00228             do {
00229                 j++;
00230                 if (j == x0) {
00231                     led_off(i);
00232                 }
00233                 if (j == x1) {
00234                     led_off(i+1);
00235                 }
00236                 if (j == x2) {
00237                     led_off(i+2);
00238                 }
00239             } while (j < 255);
00240         }
00241     }
00242 }
